name: RPS Tactics
description:
Nintendo GAME BOY™


The epic battle of Rock, Paper, and Scissors, As our hero's set out to infiltrate Rochambeau Castle attempting settle who gets shotgun..


NOTE: The game does not work in some browsers so there is also a download.


https://store.steampowered.com/app/689470/Chromasia__Rock_Paper_Tactics/

https://www.twitch.tv/nexus_games_llc

Controls:

Up Arrow - Up

Down Arrow - Down

Left Arrow - Left

Right Arrow - Right

Enter - Start

Shift - Select

Z - A

X - B


How to play:

Move your units next to enemy units to attack them. Make sure to attack whatever your unit is best against. Defeat all the enemy units!

Select will take you to your next moved unit.

Start will end your turn.



Color Palette:

(R, G, B)

(0, 0, 0) (96, 96, 96)

(168, 168, 168) (248, 248, 248)
